name: Tun Keltesch
tagline: Building AI tools for negotiation, shared expenses, and visual understanding.

paragraphs.text: I'm Tun — AI engineer, builder, and the kind of person who reads *Never Split the Difference* and *Zero to One* back to back and immediately applies it to whatever I'm working on.

I run TK MEDIA, a software studio based in Luxembourg. We build for clients who need things done right and fast — web, AI, automation — and we ship our own products on the side. Sharp team, no bloat, high standards.
I care deeply about problems that affect people daily but still have terrible solutions. That's what drives what I build.
Luxembourgish by origin, which means English, French, German, and Luxembourgish are all just... normal. Building across borders comes with the passport.
Something bigger is in the works. More soon.

tkMedia.title: TK MEDIA
tkMedia.subtitle: My Software Studio
tkMedia.description: TK MEDIA is a small software studio I started to build and ship products fast. We focus on web apps and AI automation, and we build and own our own products — ExpenseMate and NegotiationEdge.

products.name: ExpenseMate
products.tagline: Smart receipt scanning and bill-splitting app that turns messy group expenses into clean, fair splits.
bullets: Scan any receipt — AI extracts items, prices, and tax automatically
Split with friends, travel groups, or housemates in seconds
Track who owes what across multiple events and settle up easily

products.name: NegotiationEdge
products.tagline: AI negotiation coach that lets you practice high-stakes conversations in realistic simulations.
bullets: Practice salary talks, vendor deals, or investor pitches against AI
Get real-time feedback on your strategy, tone, and leverage
Built because I wanted to get better at negotiation — so I built the tool I wanted

experiments.name: Text2UML
experiments.tagline: Turn natural language into UML diagrams for faster system thinking.
experiments.description: A VS Code extension that automatically generates graphical UML representations from textual diagram descriptions. Built as my Bachelor's thesis at RWTH Aachen — combines a Java-based Language Server Protocol backend with a React + D3.js visualization frontend.

experiments.name: Tennis Coach AI
experiments.tagline: RAG-powered tennis coaching from 33 real coaching transcripts.
experiments.description: A retrieval-augmented generation system trained on 601 chunks from real tennis coaching sessions. Uses hybrid search (BM25 + vector similarity) to find relevant coaching advice, supports English and German with auto-detection, and cites its sources.
